sentences: Ta vaidles, et ta annaksin talle oma raha tagasi.
Mina ei tea, miks ma peaksin sellest loobuma; ma v√µib-olla annaksin ise endale vastuseid.
context: 'Annaksin' is the first person conditional form of the verb 'annama,' meaning to give. It expresses a hypothetical situation or wish, often used in conditional sentences where an action is dependent on certain conditions.
